[[Image:login_form.png|right|WordPress login form page screenshot]]
Login screen is your gateway to using and configuring the WordPress publishing platform. It enables access to to the [[Administration Screens|administration screens]], allowing only registered users to login.

You can customize the login screen as you wish, see the [[Customizing the Login Form]] article or [http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/search.php?q=login search for "login"] in the WordPress Plugin Directory.
